title.rendered: Ryukyu Air Commuter in Naha, Japan

content.rendered:
Ryukyu Air Commuter is an airline headquartered in Naha, Okinawa Prefecture, Japan. It operates domestic passenger services from the island of Okinawa to other islands of Okinawa Prefecture and the Amami Islands, Kagoshima Prefecture.

The airline was established in 1985 and started operations on 17 February 1985.

 

Ryukyu Air Commuter in Naha, Japan Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: 3-24 Yamashita, Naha, Okinawa Pref, Naha, 900 – 0027, Japan

Phone: +81 98 858 9664

Fax: +81 98 858 4357

Email: NA

Working hours: NA

Ryukyu Air Commuter Official website: https://rac-okinawa.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Ryukyu Air Commuter

Total fleet: 05

  • Bombardier Dash 8-Q400 Combi

Ryukyu Air Commuter Baggage Allowance

View Ryukyu Air Commuter Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Ryukyu Air Commuter Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Ryukyu Air Commuter in Naha, Japan Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Ryukyu Air Commuter in Naha, Japan: (click on the stars below)
